title: Any item cannot be selected on first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the item cannot be selected.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.

Observed Behavior:
When trying to select the label item, it does not highlight or respond to the selection.

Expected Behavior:
When attempting to select the label item, it should highlight and respond to the selection on the first attempt.
OB: When trying to select the label item, it does not highlight or respond to the selection.
EB: When attempting to select the label item, it should highlight and respond to the selection on the first attempt.
SR:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
